str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A prolonged form of nun for emphasis; just now.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bodily organ, limb, member. Of uncertain affinity; a limb or part of the body.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
